pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Medicare Reimbursement // Uses the 'CMS' application programming interface https://dnav.cms.gov/api/healthdata to provide users databases containing yearly Medicare reimbursement rates in the United States. Data can be acquired for the entire United States or only for specific localities. Currently, support is only provided for the Medicare Physician Fee Schedule, but support will be expanded for other 'CMS' databases in future versions.
